name: Magic Dice - Classic Game
description:
Come here to explore the land of great wealth!

A dreamland built on the clouds, where many treasures are hidden.

You are an adventurer, use your dice wisely in this secret realm, because it is a weapon that helps you get more rewards!

How to play:
-Roll the dice to advance and get rewards on the map.
-Unlock the map and go to the next dreamland to get more rewards.

What are you waiting for, come and explore now!
